protein.general_function: Involved in transmembrane receptor protein serine/threonine kinase activity
protein.specific_function: Serine/threonine protein kinase which forms a receptor complex on ligand binding. The receptor complex consisting of 2 type II and 2 type I transmembrane serine/threonine kinases. Type II receptors phosphorylate and activate type I receptors which autophosphorylate, then bind and activate SMAD transcriptional regulators, SMAD2 and SMAD3. Receptor for activin AB, activin B and NODAL. Plays a role in cell differentiation, growth arrest and apoptosis

go_class.description: transforming growth factor beta receptor activity
receptor signaling protein serine/threonine kinase activity
transmembrane receptor protein serine/threonine kinase activity
